### R Studio

Welcome to week 1!

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

summary(mtcars)

mtcars %>% 
  ggplot(aes(mpg, hp, color = as.factor(cyl))) +
  geom_point()

```

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
oplot <- ggplot(Orange, aes(x = age, 
                   y = circumference, 
                   colour = Tree)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  guides(colour = FALSE) +
  theme_bw()
oplot
```
